CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Core: Location, EngineHours, RunState, GeneratorPower, Fuel Used/Level
Perf: EngineLoad, FuelRate, GeneratorAvgVoltage, GeneratorAvgCurrent, Generator AC Frequency, Power %,
Remaining PwrExhaust: DEFLevel, DPFRestriction Level, DPFRegen Inhibit, DPF System Fault
Diags: Battery Voltage, Engine Coolant Temp, Engine Oil Pressure, Exhaust Temp
Boiler Perf: SteamOutput, Load, Burner I/O, Boiler & Burner Controller Alarms & Condition Ind, OperatingHrs, TotalCycles, PhaseCode, DiagCode, WaterLevel
CustomField.label: Primary Metrics
